title: "Child neurobiology impacts success in family-based behavioral treatment for children with obesity"
excerpt: "Family-based behavioral treatment (FBT) is the recommended treatment for children with common obesity. However, there is a large variability in short- and long-term treatment response, and mechanisms for unsuccessful treatment outcomes are not fully understood."
